Note: Le mod√®le a √©t√© mis √† jour le: Note: The template was updated on 24/03/2021. The production_site_reference column is no longer required. Your supplier certificate should now be listed in the 'vendor_certificate' column. Please refer to the guide for more information.
Le mod√®le simplifi√© vous permet de cr√: The simplified template allows you to create batches from your own factories. You can affiliate them immediately with registered customers on CarbuRe or simply add them to your inventory.
Le mod√®le avanc√© permet d'importer dan: The advanced model allows you to import into CarbuRe lots purchased from suppliers that are unknown to us (foreign suppliers or captive French producers). You also have the possibility to allocate these batches to foreign customers.
Le mod√®le Excel vous permet d'importer: The Excel template allows you to import batches from suppliers who are not registered on Carbide. These can be batches imported from abroad or from captive producers.
Note: Le mod√®le a √©t√© mis √† jour le: Note: The template was updated on 24/03/2021. The production_site_reference column is no longer required. Your supplier's certificate must now be listed in the 'supplier_certificate' column. Please refer to the guide for more information.
Le mod√®le Excel permet d'importer dans: The Excel template allows you to import into CarbuRe lots purchased from suppliers that are unknown to us (foreign suppliers or captive French producers). You also have the possibility to allocate these batches to foreign customers.
